item.description:
This blood drive has been changed.  The Red Cross now wants to see our numbers before allowing us to host our own blood drive to ensure that it can justify the cost for us hosting one.  We now have to account for all of the blood donated by our members from now till the end of the year so we can show The Red Cross the amount and how active our members are.

The Groton Municipal Building ( 295 Meridian St,  Groton,  CT) hosts a blood drive every 2nd Thursday from 1-6pm.   You may also donate at any time and at any location in CT or RI, but when you do, please email me at daisyscheng@gmail.com so your efforts can be accounted towards our hosting our own blood drive next year on the National Day of Reason.

Sept. 15 from 1:00 PM to 6:00 PM at the Groton Municipal Building

Donate if you can to save lives and show our neighborhood that we can do good without god.


Your efforts and help in this is greatly appreciated.

THANKS!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Groton Public Library and we'll have signs and posters

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: AHSCTRI & Red Cross Sponsored Blood Drive
